plans.name: Pay As You Go
plans.description: Check out up to 4 bikes at a time at the hourly rate using your account number and PIN. Usage is billed by the minute.

plans.name: Student Semester
plans.description: Requires confirmed .edu email address. Check out up to 3 additional bikes at the hourly rate (prorated) using account number and PIN.

plans.name: Monthly Plus Subscription
plans.description: Auto renews monthly. Check out up to 3 additional bikes at the hourly rate (prorated) using account number and PIN.

plans.name: Monthly Basic Subscription
plans.description: Auto renews monthly. Check out up to 3 additional bikes at the hourly rate (prorated) using account number and PIN.
